meanings.definition: Nilgaus: a large Asian antelope with a bluish-gray coat and short horns
meanings.sent1: The nilgaus grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of nilgaus at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The nilgaus decided to have a dance party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the bluish-gray coat of a nilgaus.
meanings.sent5: The majestic nilgaus stood out against the green backdrop of the jungle.

meanings.definition: Nilgaus: plural form of nilgau, referring to more than one of the aforementioned antelope
meanings.sent1: We spotted a herd of nilgaus on the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The nilgaus roamed freely across the grasslands.
meanings.sent3: The nilgaus threw a surprise birthday party for the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Their unity was as strong as a group of nilgaus moving together.
meanings.sent5: The vast savanna was dotted with herds of graceful nilgaus.
